text: 13:17 Ua Me Ini 1:7; 6:6; Godɨn Araziba 7:6-7; Onger Akaba 105:23-24Fomɨra Israelɨn gumazamizibar God en ovaviba amɨsevezɨma, kamaghɨn me an gumazamizibara. Egha gɨn me uan nguibam ategha ghua Isipɨn kantrin ghue. Egha dughiar kamɨn God me gamima men dɨbobonim bar pɨn ghua, me bar avɨraseme. Ezɨma gɨn God uan gavgavimɨn Isipɨn me inighava azenim gatɨ.
